config.title: Figma Tokens MCP Configuration
config.description: Configuration for the Figma Tokens MCP server. The Figma access token can be provided either through this configuration or via the FIGMA_ACCESS_TOKEN environment variable.

figmaAccessToken.title: Figma Access Token
figmaAccessToken.description: Personal access token for Figma API. Required for extracting tokens from Figma files. Get one at https://www.figma.com/developers/api#access-tokens. If not provided here, the FIGMA_ACCESS_TOKEN environment variable will be used.
